      • getField

        public java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String req,
                        java.lang.String field,
                        char delim)
        Gets the value of a field - key in the present request
        Parameters:
        field - the field or key name to fetch (-- includes every char before the value to be taken)
        delim - the cjhar which separates the value from other elements in the string
        Returns:
        the value of the field present between the given field and delim
